caption.p: Chromatogram of Eleutherococcus senticosus fruits ( C) and a mixture of reference standards ( D): a—protocatechuic acid, b—neochlorogenic acid, c—chlorogenic acid and d—cryptochlorogenic acid with PDA spectra and structures of the main compounds: ( A)—protocatechuic acid and ( B)—chlorogenic acid. C18 core-shell column (Kinetex, Phenomenex, Aschaffenburg, Germany) (25 cm × 4.6mm i.d., 5 μm particle size) at 25 °C, a mixture of water (solvent A) and acetonitrile (solvent B) with 0.025% of trifluoroacetic acid; gradient elution program: 0.0–5.0 min A 95%, B 5%; 5–60 min A from 5 to 20%, and B from 95–80%. The flow rate was 1.0 mL/min.
